root.name: Big Bird's Hide and Speak
root.description: There are six game modes in the game. Find the person Big bird calls out, Find the person Big bird calls out but this time they are hidden, find the letter Big Bird calls out , Find the letter Big Bird calls out but again they are hidden, spell three letter word that Big Bird said and finally Spell as many three letter words you can before the sun goes down. In between each round of the game someone from the show comes out and show off something for example Burt jumps rope and the count juggles.
